actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to issue marketing orders for caneberries.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to issue marketing orders for caneberries (including raspberries, blackberries, and loganberries).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to issue marketing orders for caneberries.
